title: Friends dont appear online
body:
So I have trouble viewing some people who are online. It says they're not online, however, I am able to invite them when i type their name in. So the friends and invite log does not let me see them. There are some people that are in a game but it says they're online and unavailable for invite. 

so in conclusion. The problem is that some people are not shown online or for invite when theyre indeed online or available for invite.
Riot i would like 7 rp for this discovery. I am willing to negotiate for more c:

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6). Let me know if that helps at all.
aite lemme try that. to both of the comments.
